name: ai-dev-tools-exercises
postCreateCommand:
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && printf "
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH"
" >> ~/.profile && printf "
export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$PATH" >> ~/.bashrc"
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'if command -v uv >/dev/null; then uv --version; else echo "uv non trovato: riapri il terminale o riavvia il Codespace"; fi'
